TopicTitle: Landing the Benoist XIV at night

Articles.Content: Built this craft, it's the first Airliner that began passenger flight. It's a very difficult craft to fly and I didn't take the time to show video of the craft landing. This isn't the best landing but the craft was not damaged. Anyway this is a really laid back kind of Aircraft and very challenging to fly..........and land! If you like it you can find it on the Spacecraft Exchange Forum.
